data.name: Forza Horizon 5 Welcome Pack
data.detailed_description: Kickstart your Ultimate Horizon Adventure with the Forza Horizon 5 Welcome Pack! Included are 5 special pre-tuned cars, a Player House, and a one-time grant to own any car available from the game’s Autoshow. Also included are 3 one-time grants for any Common or Rare clothing item. The Welcome Pack is included with the Premium Edition and Premium Add-Ons Bundle. This add-on requires Forza Horizon 5 (game sold separately).
data.about_the_game: Kickstart your Ultimate Horizon Adventure with the Forza Horizon 5 Welcome Pack! Included are 5 special pre-tuned cars, a Player House, and a one-time grant to own any car available from the game’s Autoshow. Also included are 3 one-time grants for any Common or Rare clothing item. The Welcome Pack is included with the Premium Edition and Premium Add-Ons Bundle. This add-on requires Forza Horizon 5 (game sold separately).
data.short_description: Kickstart your ultimate Horizon adventure with the Forza Horizon 5 Welcome Pack!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 15063.0 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5-4460 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 970 OR AMD RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 110 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 15063.0 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1070 OR AMD RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 110 GB available space
